phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number.
confirmEmailMismatchCurrent: The email does not match your current account.

confirmEmailPrompt: Please type the email registered on the account.
deleteEmailMismatch: The email does not match the account data.
noChangesToSave: There are no changes to save.
headDescription: Manage your personal and contact information.
heroSubtitle: Update your personal and contact details to keep services active and help us support you faster.
subscriptionNotSubscribed: You are not subscribed right now
subscriptionHint: Review your current status or subscribe to a plan to get all benefits.
personalDataHint: We use this data for account security and personalization. Make sure it’s accurate.
extraSettingsHint: Change the interface language or request account deletion if needed.

deleteConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteConfirmDescription: To confirm, type the email associated with the account before continuing.
biometricRequiredHint: You will be asked to sign in with biometrics before deleting inside the app.
